title: Smart Data Models - WindGenTurbineType3bIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. IEC Type 3B generator set model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.3.3.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindGenTurbineType3bIEC

fducw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Crowbar duration versus voltage variation look-up table (f()). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

mwtcwp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Crowbar control mode ().   The parameter is case dependent parameter. Default: False

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current generation Time constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

two.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant for crowbar washout filter (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0

xs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electromagnetic transient reactance (x). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0
